title: FS - (3) 1912 T207 Brown Background - Joe Wood, Bender, and Broadleaf
author: PhillyFan1883

posts.post_title: FS - (3) 1912 T207 Brown Background - Joe Wood, Bender, and Broadleaf
posts.post_content:
Gents,

3 Different T207’s up for sale. All for sale separately.
Prices are PayPal FF method, add 3 percent for invoice method. Add $10 for shipping to the total.

1.) 1912 T207 “Recruit” Smokey Joe Wood PSA 2 (SOLD) 
2.) 1912 T207 “Recruit” Chief Bender SGC 5 EX - ($550) 
3.) 1912 T207 Broadleaf Back Vean Gregg SGC 2.5 ($250)

All of the backs are clean with no paper loss.

Personal message me with any inquiries, questions  or offers.
